page.title: 20LOCAL NEWS 20/9/1985
page.content: South Wight Planning Committee have granted approval for the construction of a toilet block at the rear of the Hideaway Cafe on the cliff path at Shanklin. Alcoholic poisoning caused the death of a 63 year old Shanklin man who drank methylated spirits and surgical spirit. Two 15_year_old Shanklin youths accused of a Â£2,200 arson attack at Shanklin beach huts have been remanded for seven days in the care of the local authority. Sandown Baptist Church was filled almost to capacity on Saturday to welcome the new minister, the Rev. John Crew, at his induction service. Holidaymakers were among the many visitors at St.Saviour's Church, Shanklin, during the harvest and flower festival.
